title: Beta Client?
body: Hi, i'm running the game on MacBook Pro. The specs of the computer are over the recommended yet the game has frame lag even on the launcher while i'm picking champions, then when i started a game on the bottom i noticed that the game is in Beta Client, aswell as after updating the game i don't have the new fancy launcher. Could this be the problem of my frame rate?

replies.body: So you had issues with the Beta Client, then after an update to the client, you no longer have the Beta Client installed on your PC? I'm having a hard time understanding the events that unfolded here.
